pr_title: GG-23552 Add DR clearStore task to Web Console

timeline.bodyText: We should check that gridgain-core library in classpath.
timeline.author: vsisko
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -115,6 +115,9 @@
     /** */
     MANAGEMENT_CONSOLE(28),
 
+    /** Cluster has task to clear sender store. */
+    WC_DR_CLEAR_SENDER_STORE(29),
+

replies.bodyText:
Why and how we can check this in ignite-core module?
This ticket contains changes in ggprivate repository with tasks
replies.author: nva

replies.bodyText: We should check DR plugin. I think it can be done via classForName() ?
replies.author: akuznetsov-gridgain

replies.bodyText: We can't add checking of gridgain-core class in gridgain-ce code. In same time we has additional checks for that in our frontend/web-console code
replies.author: nva

timeline.message: Merge branches 'gg-23552' and 'master' of https://github.com/gridgain/gridgain into gg-23552
